short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to WeatherSearcher, your intelligent weather companion for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now, discover global weather up to 5 days in advance, and add bookmarks to your Chrome homepage.


I accept and agree to installing the WeatherSearcher extension and settings to the new tab search on Chrome that will be provided by Microsoft bing as per the Terms of Use policy and the privacy policy.

Privacy Policy: https://weathersearcher.com/policy.html Terms of Use: https://weathersearcher.com/term-of-use.html
